Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is promising for efficient stationary power generation.
Titulo: Economic analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration/trigeneration system for hotels in Hong Kong

Sentencas: The high temperature waste heat from SOFC stack can be recovered for cogeneration/trigeneration.
Titulo: Economic analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration/trigeneration system for hotels in Hong Kong

Sentencas: Due to the lack of relevant analysis on SOFC system in Hong Kong, this research is purposely designed to investigate the economics of a SOFC-absorption cooling cogeneration/trigeneration system for building application in Hong Kong.
Titulo: Economic analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration/trigeneration system for hotels in Hong Kong

Sentencas: Energy consumption profile of Hotel ICON is adopted for a case study.
Titulo: Economic analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration/trigeneration system for hotels in Hong Kong

Sentencas: Existing products of SOFC server and absorption chiller are chosen to configure the system.
Titulo: Economic analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration/trigeneration system for hotels in Hong Kong

Sentencas: It is found that the payback period is less than 6 years with the Government subsidy at 50% of the overall system cost for a trigeneration system.
Titulo: Economic analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration/trigeneration system for hotels in Hong Kong

Sentencas: Sensitivity analyses show that increases in the rate of electricity and the level of government subsidy increase the payback period of SOFC systems in Hong Kong.
Titulo: Economic analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration/trigeneration system for hotels in Hong Kong

Sentencas: Besides certain technological difficulties, obstacles on the way to realize the proposed cogeneration/trigeneration system in Hong Kong are legal and social constraints and space limitation as well.
Titulo: Economic analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration/trigeneration system for hotels in Hong Kong

Sentencas: This study highlights the suitability and the environmental impact of the SOFC-based multi-generation for building application in Hong Kong.
Titulo: Economic analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration/trigeneration system for hotels in Hong Kong
Economic analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell cogeneration/trigeneration system for hotels in Hong Kong
